{{velocity}} #set($extra = "") #if("$!request.space" != "") #set($extra = "${extra} and doc.space = '$request.space'") #end #if("$!request.orphaned" == "1") #set($extra = "${extra} and doc.parent='' and doc.name<>'WebHome'") #end #if("$!request.topicid" != "") #set($extrafrom = ", BaseObject as mailobj, StringProperty as proptopic") #set($extra = "${extra} and mailobj.name=doc.fullName and mailobj.className='MailArchiveCode.MailClass' and mailobj.id=proptopic.id.id and proptopic.id.name='topicid' and proptopic.id.value='${request.topicid}'") #end #if("$!request.topicsfrom" != "") #set($extrafrom = ", BaseObject as topicobj, StringProperty as proptopic") #set($extra = "${extra} and topicobj.name=doc.fullName and topicobj.className='MailArchiveCode.TopicClass' and topicobj.id=proptopic.id.id and proptopic.id.name='author' and proptopic.id.value='${request.topicsfrom}'") #end #if("$!request.mailsfrom" != "") #set($extrafrom = ", BaseObject as mailobj, LargeStringProperty as propmail") #set($extra = "${extra} and mailobj.name=doc.fullName and mailobj.className='MailArchiveCode.MailClass' and mailobj.id=propmail.id.id and propmail.id.name='from' and propmail.id.value='${request.mailsfrom}'") #end #if("$!request.objdoc" != "") ##set($extrafrom = ", BaseObject as docobj") #set($extra = "${extra} and obj.name='${request.objdoc}'") #end #gridresultwithfilter("$!request.classname" $request.collist.split(",") "$!{extrafrom}" "$!{extra}") {{/velocity}}
